nodes.bodyText: We could also replace this with a <ViewTypeLabel type={view.type} /> that renders the view type appropriately. This would also remove the need for a getter in the data class (and solve a presentation issue in the presentation layer).

I like the idea and implemented the approach. What bothers me a little, the component is just a function which returns a string. The main reason I am using the <ViewTypeLabel type={view.type} /> syntax is the import from views/components. While the syntax is useful in most cases a string would be easier to handle in this case, e.g. for the modal title.
